results.title: Life and learning
results.brief_description: Tim Kanoa expresses his culture through dance. He is proud of his Aboriginality and has been living and learning from the day he was born. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
results.description: Tim Kanoa expresses his culture through dance. He is proud of his Aboriginality and has been living and learning from the day he was born. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Turbo
results.brief_description: Rita Morrison pays tribute to indigenous artist Turbo Brown. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Morehu
results.brief_description: Rita Morrison’s mother died three days after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Her grief would link these two events forever. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: My wardrobe door
results.brief_description: Nadia Rose’s wardrobe door is full of photo’s of her friends and family. It keeps them close to her even when she is far away. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: The old man
results.creator_credit: Koorie Heritage Trust and Lee Stewart
results.brief_description: Lee Stewart pays tribute to his father who coached the local football team and was an inspiration to his sons and his players. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Old and new
results.brief_description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Journeys
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Sheiny New and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sheiny New first came to Australia from America on a special scholarship program. While here she met her future husband and never looked back. She has since become a passionate campaigner speaking out against domestic violence in the Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.title: Small town girl
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Emma Levy and ACMI
results.brief_description: Emma Levy leaves the confines of small town life in New Zealand for Melbourne in the hope of connecting with a bigger Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Emma Levy and ACMI

results.title: One wedding and several migrations
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adriana Gomberg and ACMI
results.brief_description: The dream of happiness is timeless and universal. Adriana Gomberg looks fondly back at her wedding day and recalls the reasons why her and her husband left Brazil to migrate to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adriana Gomberg and ACMI
results.description: The dream of happiness is timeless and universal. Adriana Gomberg looks fondly back at her wedding day and recalls the reasons why her and her husband left Brazil to migrate to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
